channel.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
channel.description:
Hey everyone im working on a server or learning...
I managed to blank the squeal of fortune tab by changing the interface to 16, 17000
I wanted to change this tab with players online: and information about the server...
setSidebarInterface(16, 17000); //squeal of fortune
Skype: icy-tank
Source: deathlypvpz v4 Please dont judge the source im only asking for help!

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:8, topic:551286”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670203.msg4481821#msg4481821 date=1430585718]
Well it would be optimal to use an ID that isn’t already taken, if you don’t you will run into issues later on.
Such as: your interface updating weird and showing text you didn’t want, other interfaces showing the text of the interface you want, and etc.
[/quote]

still have trouble with this tab maybe you could skype me? icy-tank

maybe i need to remove the full sof system and not just change the sendframe…[/quote]
As I had stated earlier… You need to create a new interface in the RSInterface, and then in your server you need to change the ID of the tab being sent.

Read full topic

Such as: your interface updating weird and showing text you didn’t want, other interfaces showing the text of the interface you want, and etc.[/quote]

maybe i need to remove the full sof system and not just change the sendframe…

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well it would be optimal to use an ID that isn’t already taken, if you don’t you will run into issues later on.
Such as: your interface updating weird and showing text you didn’t want, other interfaces showing the text of the interface you want, and etc.

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:551286”]You would keep the 16. that is the tab id.

the 17000 would be the id of the interface:

RSInterface Interface = addSidebarInterface(12345);
^If that was the first interface in your code for the sidebar interface, then the id would be 12345.[/quote]

What and make a random 2nd number? that isn’t used?

i changed the id to 17000 to blank the tab out for now…

Read full topic

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You would keep the 16. that is the tab id.

the 17000 would be the id of the interface:

RSInterface Interface = addSidebarInterface(12345);
^If that was the first interface in your code for the sidebar interface, then the id would be 12345.

Read full topic

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:3, topic:551286”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670203.msg4481644#msg4481644 date=1430430905]
This is mostly client sided…

You need to make the sidebar interface in the client and then set the sidebar interface id to that of the one you just made

Not an interface like the tab and remove the sof system…

Here’s an example. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/408260-free-interface-snippet-players-online.html
It’s essentially the same, but instead of a full interface (Where he has “addInterface” you use something like addSidebarInterface)
[/quote]

Possibly.

OP, do you want to CREATE a NEW interface that has the information you want, or do you simply want to change WHICH interface gets shown when you click on the tab?[/quote]

When you click onto the sof tab i want it to open the information like players online: etc

It’s essentially the same, but instead of a full interface (Where he has “addInterface” you use something like addSidebarInterface)

how does the interface number system work? for example: (16, 17000);

do i keep the 16, and change the 17000 i have no idea…

Read full topic

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551286”]This is mostly client sided…

You need to make the sidebar interface in the client and then set the sidebar interface id to that of the one you just made

Here’s an example. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/408260-free-interface-snippet-players-online.html
It’s essentially the same, but instead of a full interface (Where he has “addInterface” you use something like addSidebarInterface)[/quote]

Possibly.

OP, do you want to CREATE a NEW interface that has the information you want, or do you simply want to change WHICH interface gets shown when you click on the tab?

Read full topic

item.title: Squeal of fortune tab Removed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is mostly client sided…

You need to make the sidebar interface in the client and then set the sidebar interface id to that of the one you just made

Here’s an example. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/408260-free-interface-snippet-players-online.html
It’s essentially the same, but instead of a full interface (Where he has “addInterface” you use something like addSidebarInterface)
